description: Gov. Kathy Hochul of New York said her team was preparing new legislation to counteract a Supreme Court ruling that struck down the state’s law restricting the carrying of handguns.
title: N.Y. Governor Slams Supreme Court Ruling on Guns as ‘Reprehensible’
title_page: N.Y. Governor Slams Supreme Court Ruling on Guns as ‘Reprehensible’ - The New York Times
